alert.note: Alert for Cheboygan; Montmorency; Presque Isle (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 3:53PM EDT until May 20 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cheboygan County in northern Michigan... Southwestern Presque Isle County in northern Michigan... Northern Montmorency County in northern Michigan... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 353 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elmira, or near Gaylord, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Briley Township, Tomahawk Creek Flooding, Canada Creek Ranch, Allis Township, Bisma Township, Hawks and Royston. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
